attributes.action: Make it law to provide full recreational facilities for young people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Having our youngsters hanging round the street, with nothing to do, getting into trouble, appears to be the norm in this country.
I would like to make it law for central government, local government to allocate resources (This could be sought from private companies, to alleviate the cost to the public purse) to allow our young people, a place to go, to be able to keep fit, meet other youngsters, learn new skills, voluntry work, career information, cafe, get information on anything that is troubling them.
We have spent enough time demonising our youngsters, but what else do you expect from a group with nothing to do?
